snippet: Mr. Fleischmann believed he had achieved cold fusion in a lab, but his announcement proved premature and he was discredited.
abstract: Martin Fleischmann, scientist who pursued cold fusion in hopes of solving the world's energy needs, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fleischmann believed he had achieved cold fusion in a lab, but his announcement proved premature and he was discredited.

headline.seo: Martin Fleischmann, Cold Fusion Seeker, Dies at 85
headline.main: Martin Fleischmann, Seeker of Cold Fusion, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Martin Fleischmann, Seeker of Cold Fusion, Dies at 85
